text: "I Think I'll Just Stay Here and Drink" is a 1980 song by Merle Haggard and is the second single from his 31st studio album Back to the Barrooms. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Song charts and number 29 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks charts. It was covered by Warrant in 2017. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Country songs Category:Merle Haggard songs Category:Warrant songs
title: I Think I'll Just Stay Here and Drink
